member.name: T:NuGet.ContentModel.ContentPropertyDefinition
member.summary: Defines a property that can be used in Content Model query patterns

member.name: T:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternSet
member.summary: A set of patterns that can be used to query a set of file paths for items matching a provided criteria.

member.name: P:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternSet.GroupPatterns
member.summary: Patterns used to select a group of items that matches the criteria

member.name: P:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternSet.PathPatterns
member.summary: Patterns used to select individual items that match the criteria

member.name: P:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternSet.PropertyDefinitions
member.summary: Property definitions used for matching patterns

member.name: T:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternDefinition
member.summary: A pattern that can be used to match file paths given a provided criteria.
member.remarks: The pattern is defined as a sequence of literal path strings that must match exactly and property references, wrapped in {} characters, which are tested for compatibility with the consumer-provided criteria.

member.name: T:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternTable
member.summary: Replacement token table organized by property.

member.summary: Lookup a token and get the replacement if it exists.
